rules.description: Ctrl + Left Click to Left Click

manipulators.description: option + command + h = option + shift + left (select word ahead)
shift + h = ctrl + shift + tab (prev tab)
option + command + j = option + shift + down (select para ahead)
option + command + k = option + shift + up (select line above)
option + command + l = option + shift + right (select word after)
shift + u = option + command + hyphen (zoom out)
option + command + i = select whole line to head
shift + i = command + shift + ` (prev window within app)
control + i = command + h (hide current window)
shift + o = command ` (next window within app)
control + o = option + command + h (expose all)
shift + p = option + command + equal_sign (zoom in)
